TextView.android:text: Buddy Locator is an application developed to keep track of family and friends with ease. The application will register a user, show the user the present location on map, will help find friends and show their present location on map, once they accept your request to view their location. The user can see the directions and the estimated distance and time it would take to reach a friend. A friend list of each user is maintained, and the present location of all the friends in the list is visible on the maps. Notification alert will be sent to the user when the friend reaches your location. The user has the option to change the password and store an emergency contact number.
